                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2.3 UserServlet

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.servlet;

import com.qf.model.User;
import com.qf.service.UserService;
import com.qf.service.impl.UserServiceImpl;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc æ§åˆ¶å±‚
 */
public class UserLoginServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        // é˜²æ­¢ä¹±ç 
        req.setCharacterEncoding("UTF-8");
        resp.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");

        // 1 æ¥æ”¶è¯·æ±‚
        String username = req.getParameter("username");
        String password = req.getParameter("password");

        // 2 è°ƒç”¨ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚å¤„ç†ä¸šåŠ¡
        UserService userService = new UserServiceImpl( );
        User user = userService.login(username, password);

        // 3 æ ¹æ®ç»“æœåšå‡ºå“åº”
        PrintWriter out = resp.getWriter( );
        if (user != null) {
            // å“åº”ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ
            // åº”è¯¥æ˜¯è·³è½¬ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢æ¥å±•ç°æ•°æ®,è€Œä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥ä½œå‡ºå“åº”
            // ä½†æ˜¯ç°åœ¨è¿˜æ²¡å­¦,æš‚æ—¶è¿˜æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æ‰‹åŠ¨å“åº”
            out.write("<html>");
            out.write("<body>");
            out.write("<h1>");
            out.write("æ¬¢è¿"+user.getUsername()+"ç™»å½•");
            out.write("</h1>");
            out.write("</body>");
            out.write("</html>");
        } else {
            // å“åº”ç™»å½•ä¸æˆåŠŸ
            out.write("<html>");
            out.write("<body>");
            out.write("<h1>");
            out.write("ç”¨æˆ·åæˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯!");
            out.write("</h1>");
            out.write("</body>");
            out.write("</html>");
        }
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2.4 UserService

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä¸€èˆ¬å¼€å‘æ—¶,ä¼šå°†UserServiceä»¥åŠUserDaoè®¾è®¡æˆæ¥å£+å®ç°ç±»çš„å½¢å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              • å¯ä»¥å…ˆè®¾è®¡æ¥å£,è§„å®šé¡¹ç›®çš„åŠŸèƒ½
                                                                                                                                                                                              • æ¥å£è¿˜å¯ä»¥æ¾è€¦åˆ,å®ç°å¤šæ€,æ˜“äºä»£ç æ‰©å±•

                                                                                                                                                                                              UserServiceæ¥å£

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.service;

import com.qf.model.User;

import java.util.List;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc ç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚å¤„ç†
 */
public interface UserService {

    User login(String username, String password);

    // List<User> findAll();

    // boolean deleteUserById(int id);

}

                                                                                                                                                                                              UseServiceImpl

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.service.impl;

import com.qf.dao.UserDao;
import com.qf.dao.impl.UserDaoImpl;
import com.qf.model.User;
import com.qf.service.UserService;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc implåŒ…,åªç”¨äºå­˜æ”¾å®ç°ç±»
 * æ‰€æœ‰çš„å®ç°ç±»éƒ½åº”è¯¥æ˜¯æ¥å£å+Implæ¥å‘½å
 * ä¾‹å¦‚: UserServiceImpl
 * é€šè¿‡è¿™ä¸ªåå­—,è¦å¾—åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªä¿¡æ¯
 * 1) æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£UserService
 * 2) æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç±»UserServiceImpl
 * -----------------------------
 * Serviceå±‚,æ˜¯ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚,å¤„ç†ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘
 */
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    @Override
    public User login(String username, String password) {
        // 1 ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†
        // ä½†æ˜¯ä»Šå¤©è¿™ä¸ªéœ€æ±‚æ²¡æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆä¸šåŠ¡,å°±å¯ä»¥ä¸åš

        // 2 è°ƒç”¨æ•°æ®è®¿é—®å±‚æ“ä½œæ•°æ®åº“
        UserDao userDao = new UserDaoImpl();
        User user = userDao.login(username, password);

        // ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚è¿˜å¯ä»¥å¯¹æ•°æ®åº“è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœå†å¤„ç†

        return user;
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2.5 UserDao

                                                                                                                                                                                              UserDaoæ¥å£

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.dao;

import com.qf.model.User;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
public interface UserDao {

    User login(String username, String password);

}

                                                                                                                                                                                              UserDaoImplå®ç°ç±»

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.dao.impl;

import com.qf.dao.UserDao;
import com.qf.model.User;
import com.qf.util.DBUtil;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {

    @Override
    public User login(String username, String password) {
        String sql = "select * from tb_user where username = ? and password = ?";
        User user = DBUtil.selectOne(sql, User.class, username, password);
        return user;
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨äº†DBUtil,ä¸ä¹ æƒ¯ä½¿ç”¨çš„è¯,ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åŸå§‹çš„JDBCè‡ªå·±æ“ä½œ

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3 è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡HttpServletRequest

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¯·æ±‚çš„è½¬å‘(å°†è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘åˆ°å…¶ä»–çš„servlet)
                                                                                                                                                                                              • è·³è½¬é¡µé¢
                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ(å­˜å–æ•°æ®)

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘çš„æ€»ç»“

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘åœ°å€æ ä¸åŠ¨
                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å™¨è¡Œä¸º,æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨åŠ¨ä½œ
                                                                                                                                                                                              • æµè§ˆå™¨åªæœ‰ä¸€æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚
                                                                                                                                                                                              • å¯ä»¥å½“åšè¯·æ±‚åŸŸ,æ•°æ®å¯ä»¥åœ¨Servletä¹‹é—´å…±äº«

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.1 è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€æ±‚: å‘å‡ºè¯·æ±‚/a æ˜ å°„AServlet,åˆ©ç”¨è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘,å°†è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘åˆ°BServlet

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.servlet;

import javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
public class AServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {

        System.out.println("AServlet.doGet..." );


        // è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘
        // path: å°±æ˜¯è¦è½¬å‘çš„Servletå¯¹åº”çš„æ˜ å°„è·¯å¾„
        // RequestDispatcher dispatcher = req.getRequestDispatcher("/b");
        // æ‰§è¡Œè½¬å‘
        // dispatcher.forward(req,resp);
        // è·¯å¾„ä¸éœ€è¦å†™æˆ /é¡¹ç›®å/b
        req.getRequestDispatcher("/b").forward(req,resp);
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.servlet;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
public class BServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {

        System.out.println("BServlet.doGet..." );

    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_3_1.xsd"
version="3.1">

    <!-- æ˜ å°„AServlet -->
    <servlet>
        <servlet-name>aServlet</servlet-name>
        <servlet-class>com.qf.servlet.AServlet</servlet-class>
    </servlet>
    <servlet-mapping>
        <servlet-name>aServlet</servlet-name>
        <url-pattern>/a</url-pattern>
    </servlet-mapping>

    <!-- æ˜ å°„BServlet -->
    <servlet>
        <servlet-name>bServlet</servlet-name>
        <servlet-class>com.qf.servlet.BServlet</servlet-class>
    </servlet>
    <servlet-mapping>
        <servlet-name>bServlet</servlet-name>
        <url-pattern>/b</url-pattern>
    </servlet-mapping>
</web-app>

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.2 è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¯·æ±‚åŸŸæ˜¯æŒ‡: HttpServletRequestå¯¹è±¡ç›¸å½“äºæ˜¯å®¹å™¨,å­˜å–æ•°æ®,å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘çš„å‡ ä¸ªç±»ä¸­å…±äº«æ•°æ®.

                                                                                                                                                                                              • å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ® req.setAttribute(key,value)
                                                                                                                                                                                              • å–å‡ºæ•°æ® req.getAttribute(key)

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¯·æ±‚åŸŸä½œç”¨ä»¥åŠåœºæ™¯: åœ¨å¤šä¸ªServletè¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘çš„æ—¶å€™,ç”¨æ¥ä¼ é€’æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.servlet;

import javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Date;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
public class AServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {

        System.out.println("AServlet.doGet..." );

        // è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
        // å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®åˆ°è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
        req.setAttribute("username","jack");

        // è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘
        // path: å°±æ˜¯è¦è½¬å‘çš„Servletå¯¹åº”çš„æ˜ å°„è·¯å¾„
        // RequestDispatcher dispatcher = req.getRequestDispatcher("/b");
        // æ‰§è¡Œè½¬å‘
        // dispatcher.forward(req,resp);
        // è·¯å¾„ä¸éœ€è¦å†™æˆ /é¡¹ç›®å/b
        req.getRequestDispatcher("/b").forward(req,resp);
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.servlet;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
public class BServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {

        System.out.println("BServlet.doGet..." );

        // è¯·æ±‚åŸŸä¸­å–å‡ºæ•°æ®
        String username = (String) req.getAttribute("username");

        System.out.println("username = " + username);
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.3 è·³è½¬é¡µé¢

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 4 é‡å®šå‘

                                                                                                                                                                                              é‡å®šå‘æ˜¯HttpServletResponseå¯¹è±¡å®Œæˆä¸€ä¸ªåŠ¨ä½œ

                                                                                                                                                                                              • å¯ä»¥å°†è¯·æ±‚é‡æ–°è·³è½¬è‡³å…¶ä»–Servlet
                                                                                                                                                                                              • å¯ä»¥è·³è½¬é¡µé¢

                                                                                                                                                                                              é‡å®šå‘æ€»ç»“:

                                                                                                                                                                                              • é‡å®šå‘æ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨åŠ¨ä½œ
                                                                                                                                                                                              • é‡å®šå‘åœ°å€æ ä¼šæœ‰å˜åŒ–
                                                                                                                                                                                              • æ˜¯å‘å‡ºä¸¤æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚
                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¯·æ±‚åŸŸä¸­çš„æ•°æ®åœ¨é‡å®šå‘åä¸èƒ½å…±äº«(å› ä¸ºæ˜¯ä¸¤æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚)

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€æ±‚:

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€æ±‚: å‘å‡ºè¯·æ±‚/a æ˜ å°„AServlet,åˆ©ç”¨é‡å®šå‘,å°†è¯·æ±‚é‡æ–°å‘é€è¯·æ±‚åˆ°BServlet

                                                                                                                                                                                              public class AServlet extends HttpServlet {

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {

        System.out.println("AServlet.doGet..." );

        // è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
        // å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®åˆ°è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
        req.setAttribute("username","jack");

        // è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘
        // path: å°±æ˜¯è¦è½¬å‘çš„Servletå¯¹åº”çš„æ˜ å°„è·¯å¾„
        // RequestDispatcher dispatcher = req.getRequestDispatcher("/b");
        // æ‰§è¡Œè½¬å‘
        // dispatcher.forward(req,resp);
        // è·¯å¾„ä¸éœ€è¦å†™æˆ /é¡¹ç›®å/b,æ˜¯å› ä¸ºè¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å™¨åŠ¨ä½œ
        // /b,å³ä»æœåŠ¡å™¨æ ¹è·¯å¾„å¼€å§‹è®¿é—®,æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„æ ¹è·¯å¾„è‡ªå¸¦é¡¹ç›®å
        // http://localhost:8080/day48/b
        //req.getRequestDispatcher("/b").forward(req,resp);

        // è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘å¯ä»¥è·³è½¬é¡µé¢
        // req.getRequestDispatcher("/404.html").forward(req,resp);


        // é‡å®šå‘
        // é‡å®šå‘æ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨è¡Œä¸º,å‘å‡º/bè¯·æ±‚,é‚£å°±æ˜¯ä»æµè§ˆå™¨çš„æ ¹è·¯å¾„å‘å‡ºè¯·æ±‚
        // æµè§ˆå™¨çš„æ ¹è·¯å¾„æ˜¯ç«¯å£: http://localhost:8080/b
        String contextPath = req.getContextPath( ); // è·å¾—é¡¹ç›®å /day48
        System.out.println("contextPath = " + contextPath);

        // resp.sendRedirect(contextPath+"/b");
        resp.sendRedirect(contextPath+"/404.html");
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5 æ³¨è§£

                                                                                                                                                                                              JDK1.5åå‡ºç°çš„æŠ€æœ¯,æ³¨è§£(Annotation),æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æ³¨é‡Š,ç»™ç¨‹åºæ³¨é‡Šç„¶åç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œç»™JVMä¸­çš„javaä»£ç çœ‹çš„

                                                                                                                                                                                              • @Override

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ³¨è§£æ–‡ä»¶æ—¢ä¸æ˜¯ç±»ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯æ¥å£

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.1 åˆ›å»ºæ³¨è§£æ–‡ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.2 å…ƒæ³¨è§£

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ³¨è§£çš„æ³¨è§£å°±æ˜¯å…ƒæ³¨è§£

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.2.1 @Target

                                                                                                                                                                                              @Target ç›®æ ‡,ç”¨æ¥è§„å®šæ³¨è§£èƒ½ç”¨åœ¨ä»€ä¹ˆä½ç½®

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä½ç½®ElementType
                                                                                                                                                                                              åŒ…ä¸ŠPACKAGE
                                                                                                                                                                                              ç±»/æ¥å£/æ•°ç»„/æšä¸¾ä¸ŠTYPE
                                                                                                                                                                                              æˆå‘˜å˜é‡/å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡FIELD/LOCAL_VARIABLE
                                                                                                                                                                                              æ–¹æ³•/æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•METHOD/CONSTRUCTOR

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.2.2 @Retention

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä¿ç•™,æŒ‡æ³¨è§£ä¿ç•™åˆ°ä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™,æˆ–è€…è¯´å«ä¿ç•™è‡³ä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™ç”Ÿæ•ˆ

                                                                                                                                                                                              --

                                                                                                                                                                                              ps: å¦‚æœæ˜¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ³¨è§£,ä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†é€šè¿‡åå°„æŠ€æœ¯è¯»å–æ³¨è§£,æ‰€ä»¥è¦å®šä¹‰ä¿ç•™ç­–ç•¥ä¸ºRUNTIME

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä¿ç•™ç­–ç•¥è§£é‡Š
                                                                                                                                                                                              SOURCEæºç é˜¶æ®µæœ‰æ•ˆ
                                                                                                                                                                                              CLASSç¼–è¯‘åclassä¸­æœ‰æ•ˆ
                                                                                                                                                                                              RUNTIMEè¿è¡Œæ—¶ç”Ÿæ•ˆ

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3 æ³¨è§£å‚æ•°

                                                                                                                                                                                              @Target({ElementType.METHOD,ElementType.TYPE})
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface MyAnno {
    // æ³¨è§£çš„å‚æ•°
    // æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ å‚æ•°å();
    // ä¸€æ—¦è®¾ç½®äº†å‚æ•°,é‚£ä¹ˆåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£æ—¶å°±å¿…éœ€ç»™æ³¨è§£å‚æ•°èµ‹å€¼
    // é™¤éç»™å‚æ•°è®¾ç½®äº†é»˜è®¤å€¼
    int a() default 0;

    // å½“æ³¨è§£çš„å‚æ•°åvalue,ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶å¯ä»¥çœç•¥
    String value() default "";

    String[] values() default "";

}

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ³¨è§£çš„å‚æ•°éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†é€šè¿‡åå°„æŠ€æœ¯å»è¯»å–åˆ°æ³¨è§£å‚æ•°ä¸­çš„å€¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.4 å®é™…åº”ç”¨

                                                                                                                                                                                              Servletå¼€å‘ä¸­ä¹Ÿæ”¯æŒä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£,å¤§å¤§æé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡

                                                                                                                                                                                              • @WebServlet æ³¨è§£,å¯ä»¥å–ä»£web.xmlä¸­[ç»å…¸8è¡Œ]ä»£ç 

                                                                                                                                                                                              # day18

                                                                                                                                                                                              # ä»Šæ—¥å†…å®¹

                                                                                                                                                                                              0 å¤ä¹ æ˜¨æ—¥ 1 Cookie 2 Session 3 Filter

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 0 å¤ä¹ æ˜¨æ—¥

                                                                                                                                                                                              1 MVCå’Œä¸‰å±‚æ¶æ„æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ?
MVC 
ä¸‰å±‚æ¶æ„: controller,service,dao

2 è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆç‰¹ç‚¹
req.getRequestDispatcher(path).forward(req,resp);
åŠŸèƒ½: 1) å°†è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘åˆ°å…¶ä»–servlet
        2) å½“åšåŸŸå¯¹è±¡å­˜å–æ•°æ® 
		  req.setAttribute(key,value)
		  req.getAttribute(key)
        3) è·³è½¬é¡µé¢
  ç‰¹ç‚¹:
		1) åœ°å€æ ä¸å˜
		2) è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å™¨åŠ¨ä½œ
		3) ä¸€æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚
		4) åœ¨ä¸€æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚ä¸­,è¯·æ±‚åŸŸæ˜¯å¯ä»¥å…±äº«
3 é‡å®šå‘æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆç‰¹ç‚¹
  resp.sendRedirect(location);
  åŠŸèƒ½: 1) è·³è½¬Servlet
		2) è·³è½¬é¡µé¢
  ç‰¹ç‚¹: 
		1) åœ°å€æ ä¼šæ”¹å˜
		2) é‡å®šå‘æ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨åŠ¨ä½œ
		3) ä¸¤æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚
		4) åœ¨é‡å®šå‘ä¸­,è¯·æ±‚åŸŸæ˜¯ä¸å¯ä»¥å…±äº«

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 1 å…³äºè·¯å¾„

                                                                                                                                                                                              â€‹ å…³äºè¯·æ±‚æ—¶å‡ºçš„è·¯å¾„

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è·¯å¾„ä¸­åŠ /,å°±æ˜¯ä»æ ¹è·¯å¾„è¯·æ±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è·¯å¾„ä¸­ä¸åŠ /,å°±æ˜¯ä»å½“å‰è·¯å¾„è¯·æ±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å™¨åŠ¨ä½œ,æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„æ ¹è·¯å¾„æ˜¯é¡¹ç›®å,/bè¯·æ±‚,å…¶å®æ˜¯

                                                                                                                                                                                                http://localhost:8080/é¡¹ç›®å/bopen in new window

                                                                                                                                                                                              • é‡å®šå‘æ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨åŠ¨ä½œ,æµè§ˆå™¨çš„æ ¹è·¯å¾„æ˜¯ç«¯å£,/bè¯·æ±‚,å…¶å®æ˜¯
