                                                                                                                                                                                              <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Title</title>
    <!-- å¼•å…¥layui.cssæ ¸å¿ƒæ ·å¼ -->
    <link href="/layui/css/layui.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>

<!-- åœ¨æ­¤å¤„å†™ä¸»è¦å†…å®¹ -->
<button type="button" class="layui-btn">ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡å‡†çš„æŒ‰é’®</button>
<a href="" class="layui-btn">ä¸€ä¸ªå¯è·³è½¬çš„æŒ‰é’®</a>

<!-- å¼•å…¥layui.jsæ ¸å¿ƒ -->
<script src="/layui/layui.js"></script>
<!-- layuiæ¨¡å— -->
<script>
    layui.use(['layer'], function(){
        var layer = layui.layer;

        layer.msg('Hello World - layui');
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 4 é¡µé¢å…ƒç´ 

                                                                                                                                                                                              é¡µé¢å…ƒç´ : ç†è§£ä¸ºä¸€äº›é™æ€html+cssæ ·å¼ç»„ä»¶,(æ‹¿èµ°å³ç”¨)

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 4.1 å¸ƒå±€

                                                                                                                                                                                              layuiæœ‰æ …æ ¼ç³»ç»Ÿ,é‡‡ç”¨ä¸šç•Œæ¯”è¾ƒå¸¸è§çš„ 12 ç­‰åˆ†è§„åˆ™

                                                                                                                                                                                              å¸ƒå±€å®¹å™¨

                                                                                                                                                                                              • class="layui-container" æ°´å¹³å±…ä¸­,ä¸¤è¾¹æœ‰ç•™ç™½
                                                                                                                                                                                              • class="layui-fluid" é“ºæ»¡å…¨å±

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ …æ ¼ç³»ç»Ÿè¦é…åˆå®¹å™¨ä½¿ç”¨,å…ˆå®šä¹‰å®¹å™¨,å®¹å™¨ä¸­å®šä¹‰è¡Œ,è¡Œå†…å®šä¹‰åˆ—

                                                                                                                                                                                              <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>å¸ƒå±€</title>
    <!-- å¼•å…¥layui.cssæ ¸å¿ƒæ ·å¼ -->
    <link href="/layui/css/layui.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
<!-- åœ¨æ­¤å¤„å†™ä¸»è¦å†…å®¹ -->
<!-- 1å…ˆå†™å®¹å™¨(layui-container : æ°´å¹³å±…ä¸­) -->
<div class="layui-container" style="background-color: red;height: 300px">

    <!--2 å®¹å™¨å†…å†™è¡Œ
        è¡Œ layui-row
    -->
    <div class="layui-row" style="background-color: #00f7de;height: 200px;">
        <!--3 è¡Œå†…å†™åˆ—
            layui-col-md*
            æ€»å…±12åˆ—
        -->
        <div class="layui-col-md9" style="background-color: #01aaed">
            9/12
        </div>
        <div class="layui-col-md3" style="background-color: #009688">
            3/12
        </div>
    </div>

</div>

<hr>

<!-- 1å…ˆå†™å®¹å™¨
    layui-fluid : é“ºæ»¡å…¨å±
 -->
<div class="layui-fluid" style="background-color: red;height: 300px">

    <!--2 å®¹å™¨å†…å†™è¡Œ-->
    <div class="layui-row" style="background-color: #00f7de;height: 200px;">
        <!--3 è¡Œå†…å†™åˆ—-->
        <div class="layui-col-md9" style="background-color: #01aaed">
            9/12
        </div>
        <div class="layui-col-md3" style="background-color: #009688">
            3/12
        </div>
    </div>

</div>
<hr>
<div class="layui-container" style="height: 300px">

    <!--2 å®¹å™¨å†…å†™è¡Œ
        layui-col-space10 å•å…ƒæ ¼é—´è·
    -->
    <div class="layui-row layui-col-space10" style="height: 150px;">
        <!--3 è¡Œå†…å†™åˆ—-->
<!--        <div class="layui-col-md4" style="background-color: #01aaed;height: 150px;">-->
<!--            1/3-->
<!--        </div>-->

        <!-- åç§»é‡layui-col-md-offset4 -->
        <div class="layui-col-md4 layui-col-md-offset4" style="background-color: #009688;height: 150px;">
            1/3
        </div>

<!--            1/3-->
<!--        </div>-->
    </div>

    <!--2 å®¹å™¨å†…å†™è¡Œ-->
    <div class="layui-row" style="background-color: #00f7de;height: 150px;">
        <!--3 è¡Œå†…å†™åˆ—-->
        <div class="layui-col-md8" style="background-color: #01aaed;height: 150px;">
            2/3
        </div>
        <div class="layui-col-md4" style="background-color: #009688;height: 150px;">
            1/3
        </div>
    </div>

<!-- å¼•å…¥layui.jsæ ¸å¿ƒ -->
<script src="/layui/layui.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 4.2 å›¾æ ‡

                                                                                                                                                                                              é€šè¿‡å¯¹ä¸€ä¸ªå†…è”å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬æ¨èç”¨ iæ ‡ç­¾ï¼‰è®¾å®š class="layui-icon"ï¼Œæ¥å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå›¾æ ‡ï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹å…ƒç´ åŠ ä¸Šå›¾æ ‡å¯¹åº”çš„ font-classï¼Œå³å¯æ˜¾ç¤ºå‡ºä½ æƒ³è¦çš„å›¾æ ‡ï¼Œè­¬å¦‚ï¼š

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5 å†…ç½®æ¨¡å—

                                                                                                                                                                                              å†…ç½®æ¨¡å—

                                                                                                                                                                                              • layui å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€å¥—æ›´è½»é‡çš„æ¨¡å—è§„èŒƒ
                                                                                                                                                                                              • å°†ä¸€äº›ç‰¹æ®ŠåŠŸèƒ½,æ¯”å¦‚ä¸€äº›åŠ¨æ€æ•ˆæœ,å°è£…æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªä¸€ä¸ªçš„å‡½æ•°,ä¸€ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¨¡å—,æ¯ä¸ªæ¨¡å—æœ‰å¯¹åº”çš„åå­—
                                                                                                                                                                                              • ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™éœ€è¦åŠ è½½è¿™äº›å‡½æ•°æˆ–è€…è¯´æ¨¡å—,ç„¶åå†ä½¿ç”¨å¯¹åº”çš„åŠŸèƒ½

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡å—çš„è¯­æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è¦å…ˆåŠ è½½æ¨¡å—,layui é€šè¿‡ use æ–¹æ³•åŠ è½½æ¨¡å—
                                                                                                                                                                                              • å†è·å¾—å¯¹åº”çš„æ¨¡å—å¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                              • åœ¨useæ–¹æ³•çš„å›è°ƒä¸­å®Œæˆä¸šåŠ¡
                                                                                                                                                                                              <script>
    // 1 åŠ è½½æ¨¡å—,å¯ä»¥ä¸€æ¬¡åŠ è½½å¤šä¸ªæ¨¡å—,æ­¤æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨æ•°ç»„
    layui.use(['form','layer','table'],function(){
       // 2è·å¾—å¯¹åº”çš„æ¨¡å—å¯¹è±¡
       var form = layui.form;
       var layer = layui.layer;
       var table = layui.table;
    
       // 3 å®Œæˆä¸€äº›ä¸šåŠ¡
       form.on('submit(formDemo)',function(){
           return false;
       })
     
       layer.msg();
       layer.confirm();
       layer.alert();
    
       table.render()
    });
</script>

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.1 å¼¹å‡ºå±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              å¼¹å‡ºå±‚,æ¨¡å—ålayer

                                                                                                                                                                                              å¼¹å‡ºå±‚æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                              • layer.open(options)

                                                                                                                                                                                              • layer.msg(content,options,end)

                                                                                                                                                                                              • layer.alert(content,options,end)

                                                                                                                                                                                              • layer.confirm(content,options,yes,end)

                                                                                                                                                                                              layer.confirm

                                                                                                                                                                                              <script src="/layui/layui.js"></script>
<script>
  // 1 åŠ è½½æ¨¡å—
  layui.use('layer',function (){
    // 2 è·å¾—å¯¹è±¡
    var layer = layui.layer;

    // 3 ä½¿ç”¨
    // layer.msg("è¿™æ˜¯layerå¼¹å‡º")
      layer.confirm("æ˜¯å¦åˆ é™¤?",{
          area: ['500px', '300px'],
          title:"åˆ é™¤???",
          skin:"layui-layer-molv",
          shade: [0.5, '#393D49'],
          shadeClose:false
      },function (index){
          console.log("ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤")
          // å°†æ¥å‘ajaxè¯·æ±‚,åå°åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®
          layer.close(index);
      },function (index){
          console.log("å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤")
          layer.close(index);
      });

  })
</script>

                                                                                                                                                                                              layer.open(options)

                                                                                                                                                                                                    layer.open({
          type:0, // 0 é»˜è®¤æ¡†
          content:"è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªopenå¼¹æ¡†",
          title:"open",
          area:['500px', '300px'],
          yes:function (index){
              console.log("ç¡®å®š...")
              layer.close(index) // å…³é—­å¼¹å‡ºå±‚
          },
          cancel:function (index){
              console.log("å–æ¶ˆ...")
              layer.close(index)
          }
      })

                                                                                                                                                                                              layer.open(options) å¼¹å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢,ä¾‹å¦‚æ·»åŠ é¡µé¢

                                                                                                                                                                                                    layer.open({
          type:2, // 2 iframeæ¡†æ¶å±‚
          content:"http://localhost:8080/02bd.html", // æ¡†æ¶å†…æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„é¡µé¢
          area:['500px','600px']
      })

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.2 æ—¥æœŸ

    layui.use('laydate',function (){
        var laydate = layui.laydate;

        laydate.render({
            elem:"#test",  //  ç»‘å®šå…ƒç´ 
            type:"datetime", // é€‰æ‹©çš„æ—¥æœŸç±»å‹
            range:false,     // æ˜¯å¦å¼€å¯èŒƒå›´é€‰æ‹©

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3 è¡¨æ ¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ¨¡å—åŠ è½½åç§°ï¼štable

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.1 å…¥é—¨æ¼”ç¤º

                                                                                                                                                                                              <!DOCTYPE html>

    layui.use("table",function (){
        var table = layui.table;
        table.render({
            elem:"#test",
            height:312,
            url:"https://www.fastmock.site/mock/4aa2a624e009051fe726c20c2419c09b/layuidata/api/users",
            page:true,
            cols:[[
                {field:"id",title:"ç¼–å·",width:90,sort:true},
                {field:"username",title:"ç”¨æˆ·å"},
                {field:"sex",title:"æ€§åˆ«"},
                {field:"sign",title:"ç­¾å"},
                {field:"experience",title:"ç»éªŒ"}
            ]]
        })
    })
    /**
     * ã€éå¸¸é‡è¦ã€‘ã€éå¸¸é‡è¦ã€‘ã€éå¸¸é‡è¦ã€‘
     * 1 tableæ¸²æŸ“æ•°æ®çš„å‰æ,åå°è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ä¸€å®šæ˜¯json
     * 2 ä¸”jsonæ ¼å¼å¿…é¡»æ˜¯
     *  {
          "code": 0,
          "msg": "",
          "count": 1000,
          "data": [{}, {}]
        }
       ,å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯,é‚£ä¹ˆå°±éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡parseDataæ¥è½¬æ¢
       3 codeå¿…é¡»æ˜¯0æ—¶,è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯æˆåŠŸ,æ‰ä¼šæ¸²æŸ“å‡ºæ•ˆæœ
     */

</script>
</body>
</html>

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.2 åå°servletæ¥å£

                                                                                                                                                                                              ps: åå°æ¥å£,æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯å‰åç«¯äº¤äº’å¯¹æ¥çš„å£å­,æ¥å£.ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æŒ‡åç«¯æ§åˆ¶å±‚ä»£ç .

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€æ±‚: å‰ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨layui.tableæ¨¡å—,åŠ è½½åå°æ•°æ®å¹¶åœ¨å‰ç«¯å±•ç°.

                                                                                                                                                                                              åå°ä»£ç ç¼–å†™,å°±æ˜¯ä¸‰å±‚æ¶æ„(servlet+service+dao),è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªjsonæ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä¸‰å±‚æ¶æ„çš„ä»£ç ä¸å†ç²˜è´´

                                                                                                                                                                                              public class ResultData {

    private int code;
    private String msg;
    private Object data;

    public static ResultData fail(){
        ResultData resultData = new ResultData( );
        resultData.setCode(500);
        resultData.setMsg("å¤±è´¥");
        return resultData;
    }

    public static ResultData ok(){
        ResultData resultData = new ResultData( );
        resultData.setCode(200);
        resultData.setMsg("æˆåŠŸ");
        return resultData;
    }

    public static ResultData ok(Object data){
        ResultData resultData = new ResultData( );
        resultData.setCode(200);
        resultData.setMsg("æˆåŠŸ");
        resultData.setData(data);
        return resultData;
    }

    // setter getter...
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.3 è½¬æ¢è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              table ç»„ä»¶é»˜è®¤è§„å®šçš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ä¸ºï¼š

                                                                                                                                                                                              {
  "code": 0,  // è¿”å›0æ‰æ˜¯æˆåŠŸ
  "msg": "",
  "count": 1000,  // æ•°æ®æ¡æ•°,åˆ†é¡µä¸­ä½¿ç”¨
  "data": [{}, {}]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ¥å£è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼å¹¶ä¸ä¸€å®šéƒ½ç¬¦åˆ table é»˜è®¤è§„å®šçš„æ ¼å¼ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå·±çš„è¿”å›å€¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              {
	"code": 200, // åå°javaè¿”å›200æ˜¯æˆåŠŸ
	"msg":"",
	"data": [{},{}]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              é‚£ä¹ˆéœ€è¦å€ŸåŠ© parseData å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°å°†å…¶è§£ææˆ table ç»„ä»¶æ‰€è§„å®šçš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              table.render({
  elem: '#demp'
  ,url: ''
  ,parseData: function(res){ //res å³ä¸ºåŸå§‹è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®
    return {
      "code": res.code == 200 ? 0 : -1, //è§£ææ¥å£çŠ¶æ€
      "msg": res.msg, //è§£ææç¤ºæ–‡æœ¬
      "count": res.data.length, //è§£ææ•°æ®é•¿åº¦
      "data": res.data //è§£ææ•°æ®åˆ—è¡¨
    };
  }
  //,â€¦â€¦ //å…¶ä»–å‚æ•°
});

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.4 æ•°æ®æ¨¡æ¿

                                                                                                                                                                                              tableæ¨¡æ¿å†…,æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°templet,å¯ä»¥å°†åå°è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®å†è½¬æ¢æˆæŒ‡å®šçš„æ•°æ®è¿”å›ç»™table

                                                                                                                                                                                              templet å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•° dï¼ˆåŒ…å«å½“å‰è¡Œæ•°æ®åŠç‰¹å®šçš„é¢å¤–å­—æ®µï¼‰ã€‚å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

                                                                                                                                                                                              table.render({
            elem:"#test",
            height:312,
            url:"http://localhost:8080/user/list",
            page:true,
            cols:[[
                {field:"id",title:"ç¼–å·",width:90,sort:true},
                {field:"username",title:"ç”¨æˆ·å",align:"center"},
                {field:"password",title:"å¯†ç "},
                {field:"phone",title:"æ‰‹æœºå·"},
                {field:"createTime",title:"æ³¨å†Œæ—¶é—´",templet:function (d){
                   // console.log("d ==>" ,d);
                   let now = new Date(d.createTime);
                   let year = now.getFullYear();
                   let month = now.getMonth() +1;
                   let day = now.getDate();
                   return year+"å¹´"+month+"æœˆ"+day+"æ—¥";
                }},
                {field:"money",title:"ä½™é¢",sort: true},
                {field:"sex",title:"æ€§åˆ«",templet:function (d){
                    return d.sex == 1 ? 'ç”·':'å¥³';
                }}
            ]],

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.5 åˆ†é¡µæ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              table.renderä¸­è®¾ç½® page:true,å¼€å¯åˆ†é¡µ

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.6 æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’®

                                                                                                                                                                                              layui.tableæä¾›ä¸¤ç§æ–¹æ¡ˆæ¥ç»™è¡¨æ ¼æä¾›æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’®

                                                                                                                                                                                              • é€šè¿‡toolbar,æŒ‡å®šæŒ‰é’®è„šæœ¬
                                                                                                                                                                                              • é€šè¿‡templet,è‡ªå·±æ‹¼æ¥

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ–¹æ¡ˆä¸€:toolbar

                                                                                                                                                                                              1)è®¾ç½®æŒ‰é’®è„šæœ¬

                                                                                                                                                                                              2)ä½¿ç”¨toolbarå¼•ç”¨è„šæœ¬

    <a class="layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-warm">ç¼–è¾‘</a>
    <a class="layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-danger">åˆ é™¤</a>
</script>

    layui.use("table",function (){
        var table = layui.table;

            elem:"#test",

                // ....
                {

 </script>

    let str = "<a class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-warm\">ç¼–è¾‘</a>";
    str += " <a class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-danger\">åˆ é™¤</a>";
    return str;
    }

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 5.3.7 æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                              layuiæœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†æ–¹å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              • ç»™tableæ ‡ç­¾è®¾ç½®è¿‡æ»¤å™¨ lay-filter="éšæ„å"

                                                                                                                                                                                                • <table class="layui-table" lay-filter="test"></table>

                                                                                                                                                                                              • è®¾ç½®äº‹ä»¶æº

                                                                                                                                                                                                • åœ¨æŒ‰é’®æ ‡ç­¾ä¸­è®¾ç½® lay-event="è‡ªå·±éšä¾¿å†™çš„äº‹ä»¶å"

                                                                                                                                                                                              • ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                                • table.on('äº‹ä»¶(filter)')
                                                                                                                                                                                                • table.on('toolbar(test)', function(obj){}
                                                                                                                                                                                              <table id="test" lay-filter="myTableFilter"></table>
<script type="text/javascript">
    layui.use(["table","layer","jquery"],function (){
        var table = layui.table;
        var layer = layui.layer;
        var $ = layui.jquery;
        table.render({
            elem:"#test",
            height:312,
            url:"http://localhost:8080/user/list",
            page:true,
            cols:[[
                {field:"id",title:"ç¼–å·",width:90,sort:true},
                // ....
                {
                    title:"æ“ä½œ",templet:function (d){
                        let str = "<a class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-warm\" lay-event='edit'>ç¼–è¾‘</a>";
                        str += " <a class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-danger\" lay-event='delete'>åˆ é™¤</a>";
                        return str;
                    }
                }
            ]]
        // ç»™tool,å³æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’®ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶
        table.on('tool(myTableFilter)',function (obj){
            // console.log("obj ==>" , obj) // obj æ˜¯äº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘çš„å¯¹è±¡,å†…å«å½“å‰è¡Œæ•°æ®ä»¥åŠè‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶å
            if (obj.event == 'edit') {
                // å‘é€ajaxè¯·æ±‚
                // $.ajax()
                layer.msg("æ›´æ–°");
            } else if (obj.event == "delete") {
                layer.confirm("åˆ é™¤?",function (index){
                    console.log("ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤!")
                    layer.close(index);
                },function (index){
                    console.log("å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤!")
                    layer.close(index);
                });
            }
        })
    })
</script>

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„!!!!

                                                                                                                                                                                              table.on('tool(myTableFilter)'

                                                                                                                                                                                              toolæ˜¯å›ºå®šçš„äº‹ä»¶å,ä¸èƒ½ä¹±æ”¹

                                                                                                                                                                                              myTableFilteræ˜¯tableæ ‡ç­¾ä¸­filterçš„åå­—

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ajaxå‘é€è¯·æ±‚çš„è¯,

                                                                                                                                                                                              1)é¡¹ç›®ä¸­éœ€è¦åŠ å…¥jquery.jsæ–‡ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                              2)æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨scriptå¼•ç”¨jqueryæ–‡ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                              3)layuiåŠ è½½jqueryæ¨¡å—

                                                                                                                                                                                              4)è·å¾—jqueryå¯¹è±¡å°±å¯ä»¥æ“ä½œäº†

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2.5 å®ä½“ç±»,å·¥å…·ç±»

                                                                                                                                                                                              public class User {

    private int id;
    private String username;
    private String password;
    private String phone;
    private Date createTime;
    private double money;
    private int sex;
    // setter getter   
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              DBUtil

                                                                                                                                                                                              ...

                                                                                                                                                                                              ResultData (ç¬¦å’Œå‰åç«¯äº¤äº’ä½¿ç”¨çš„jsonæ ¼å¼)

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.util;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc å°è£…çš„ç»“æœæ•°æ®
 * --> ç¬¦åˆlayuié»˜è®¤æ¨¡æ¿æ ¼å¼
 * {
 *   "code": 0,
 *   "msg": "",
 *   "count": 1000,
 *   "data": [{}, {}]
 * }
 */
public class ResultData {

    private int code; // 0æ˜¯æˆåŠŸ,å…¶ä»–éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸æˆåŠŸ
    private String msg;
    private int count;
    private Object data;

    public ResultData() {
    }


    public static ResultData ok(Object data) {
        ResultData resultData = new ResultData( );
        resultData.setCode(0);
        resultData.setMsg("æˆåŠŸ");
        resultData.setData(data);

        return resultData;
    }

    public static ResultData ok(Object data,int count) {
        ResultData resultData = new ResultData( );
        resultData.setCode(0);
        resultData.setMsg("æˆåŠŸ");
        resultData.setData(data);
        resultData.setCount(count);
        return resultData;
    }

    public static ResultData fail() {
        ResultData resultData = new ResultData( );
        resultData.setCode(-1);
        resultData.setMsg("å¤±è´¥");
        return resultData;
    }

    public int getCode() {
        return code;
    }

    public void setCode(int code) {
        this.code = code;
    }

    public String getMsg() {
        return msg;
    }

    public void setMsg(String msg) {
        this.msg = msg;
    }

    public int getCount() {
        return count;
    }

    public void setCount(int count) {
        this.count = count;
    }

    public Object getData() {
        return data;
    }

    public void setData(Object data) {
        this.data = data;
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2.6 æ‹¦æˆªå™¨

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.filter;

import javax.servlet.*;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebFilter;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼+å†…å®¹ç±»å‹è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
 */
@WebFilter("/*")
public class EncodingContentTypeFilter implements Filter {
    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {}

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {

        request.setCharacterEncoding("UTF-8");
        // ç›´æ¥å›ºå®š,æ¯ä¸ªå“åº”éƒ½æ˜¯json
        response.setContentType("application/json;charset=UTF-8");

        // æ”¾è¡Œ
        chain.doFilter(request,response);
    }

    @Override
    public void destroy() {}
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2.7 å‰ç«¯ç¯å¢ƒ

                                                                                                                                                                                              • layuièµ„æº
                                                                                                                                                                                              • jqueryèµ„æº

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3 åŠŸèƒ½å¼€å‘

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.1 é¦–é¡µ

                                                                                                                                                                                              éœ€æ±‚: æ‰“å¼€index.htmlå±•ç°æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              å‰ç«¯é¡µé¢

                                                                                                                                                                                              <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>é¦–é¡µ</title>
    <link href="/layui/css/layui.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>


<div class="layui-container">

    <div class="layui-row">
        <div class="layui-col-md3 layui-col-md-offset5">
            <h1>ç”¨æˆ·ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ</h1>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="layui-row">

        <div class="layui-col-md10 layui-col-md-offset1">
            <!-- è¡¨æ ¼å®¹å™¨ -->
            <table id="userTable"></table>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


<script src="/layui/layui.js"></script>
<script>

    layui.use(["table"],function (){
        let table = layui.table;

        table.render({
            elem:"#userTable",
            url:"/user/list",
            cols:[[
                {field: "id", title: "ID", sort: true,width:80},
                {field: "username", title: "ç”¨æˆ·å",width:100},
                {field: "password", title: "å¯†ç ",width:100},
                {field: "phone", title: "æ‰‹æœºå·",width:120},
                {field: "money", title: "ä½™é¢", sort: true,width:100},
                {field: "sex", title: "æ€§åˆ«", sort: true,width:80,templet:function(obj){
                    // console.log(obj.sex)
                    return obj.sex == 1? 'ç”·':'å¥³';
                }},
                {field: "createTime", title: "æ³¨å†Œæ—¶é—´", sort: true,templet:function (obj) {
                    let date = new Date(obj.createTime);
                    let year = date.getFullYear();
                    let month = date.getMonth() + 1;
                    if (month < 10) {
                        month = "0"+month;
                    }
                    let day = date.getDate();
                    if (day < 10) {
                        day = "0"+day;
                    }
                    return year+"-"+month+"-"+day;
                }},
            ]]
        })
    })
</script>
</body>
</html>

                                                                                                                                                                                              åç«¯ä»£ç 

                                                                                                                                                                                              UserListServlet

                                                                                                                                                                                              package com.qf.servlet;

import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSON;
import com.qf.service.UserService;
import com.qf.service.impl.UserServiceImpl;
import com.qf.util.ResultData;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * --- å¤©é“é…¬å‹¤ ---
 *
 * @author QiuShiju
 * @desc
 */
@WebServlet("/user/list")
public class UserListServlet extends HttpServlet {

    private UserService userService = new UserServiceImpl();

    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {
        // æ¥æ”¶å‚æ•°

        // è°ƒç”¨ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚
        ResultData resultData = userService.findAll();

        // å“åº”
        String jsonString = JSON.toJSONString(resultData);
        resp.getWriter().write(jsonString);
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              UserService&UserServiceImpl

                                                                                                                                                                                              public interface UserService {
    ResultData findAll();
}
-----
public class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {

    private UserDao userDao = new UserDaoImpl();

    @Override
    public ResultData findAll() {
        List<User> list = userDao.findAll();

        // åç»­è¿˜è¦æ”¹åŠ¨..

        return ResultData.ok(list);
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              UserDao&UserDaoImpl

                                                                                                                                                                                              public interface UserDao {
    List<User> findAll();
}

----------------------------------------
public class UserDaoImpl implements UserDao {
    @Override
    public List<User> findAll() {

        List<User> list = DBUtil.selectAll("select * from tb_user", User.class);

        return list;
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.2 æ·»åŠ 

                                                                                                                                                                                              å‰ç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              1. è®¾ç½®æ·»åŠ æŒ‰é’®

                                                                                                                                                                                              2. ç»‘å®šjsäº‹ä»¶,å¼¹å‡ºå±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              3. å¼¹å‡ºå±‚å†…åŠ è½½user-add.html

                                                                                                                                                                                              4. user-add.htmlé‡Œé¢å†™è¡¨å•æ ·å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                              5. ç»‘å®šæäº¤æŒ‰é’®,ç‚¹å‡»æäº¤è§¦å‘ajaxäº‹ä»¶,å‘é€è¯·æ±‚åŠæ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              6. åœ¨user-add.htmlå…³é—­å¼¹å‡ºå±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              7. åœ¨index.htmlä¸­ç­‰å¼¹å‡ºå±‚é”€æ¯å,å†é‡æ–°åŠ è½½æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              åç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              1. æ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®,å®Œæˆå¤„ç†(servlet+service+dao)
                                                                                                                                                                                              2. ä½œå‡ºå“åº”

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.3 æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’®

                                                                                                                                                                                              {
    title:"æ“ä½œ",templet:function (d){
    let str = "<a class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-warm\">ç¼–è¾‘</a>";
    str += " <a class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-danger\">åˆ é™¤</a>";
    return str;
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.4 åˆ é™¤

                                                                                                                                                                                              å‰ç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              1. ç‚¹å‡»åˆ é™¤æŒ‰é’®,å¼¹å‡ºç¡®è®¤æ¡†

                                                                                                                                                                                                1. ç»™tableè®¾ç½®lay-filter,å¹¶ä¸”ç»™ä¸¤ä¸ªæ“ä½œæŒ‰é’®è®¾ç½®lay-event
                                                                                                                                                                                                2. ç»™è¡¨æ ¼ç»‘å®šå·¥å…·æ äº‹ä»¶ table.on("tool(è¿‡æ»¤å™¨)",function(obj){})
                                                                                                                                                                                                3. é€šè¿‡eventåˆ¤æ–­å…·ä½“äº‹ä»¶
                                                                                                                                                                                                4. layerå¼¹å‡ºç¡®è®¤æ¡†

                                                                                                                                                                                              2. ç‚¹å‡»å–æ¶ˆ,ä¸åˆ é™¤,å…³é—­å¼¹å‡ºå±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              3. ç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®š,ä½¿ç”¨ajaxå‘é€è¯·æ±‚,æºå¸¦å½“å‰è¡Œçš„id,æ‰§è¡Œåˆ é™¤

                                                                                                                                                                                              4. å…³é—­å¼¹å‡ºå±‚,é‡æ–°åŠ è½½è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                                // è¡¨æ ¼ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
table.on("tool(userTableFilter)",function (obj) {
    // console.log("obj-event ==>",obj)
    if (obj.event == "delete") {
        layer.confirm("ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤å—?",{icon: 3, title:'æç¤º'},function (index){
            // å‘è¯·æ±‚æ‰§è¡Œåˆ é™¤
            // console.log("id ==>",obj.data.id)
            $.get("/user/delete",{id:obj.data.id},function (ret) {
                if (ret.code == 0) {
                    layer.msg("åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ!")
                } else {
                    layer.msg("åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥!")
                }
            });
            layer.close(index);
            table.reload("userTable")
        },function (index){
            layer.msg("å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤!")
            layer.close(index);
        })
    }else if(obj.event == "edit") {
        // æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ...
    }
});

                                                                                                                                                                                              åç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              1. æ¥æ”¶è¯·æ±‚,æ¥æ”¶id
                                                                                                                                                                                              2. servlet <--> service <--> dao
                                                                                                                                                                                              3. å“åº”

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.5 æ›´æ–°

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.5.1 æ›´æ–°å¼¹å‡ºå±‚
                                                                                                                                                                                              else if(obj.event == "edit") {
    layer.open({
        type:2,
        content:"user-edit.html", 
        // æ–°å»ºuser-edit.htmlé¡µé¢(å¤åˆ¶çš„user-add.html)
        area: ["400px", "500px"],
        title:"æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·",
        end:function (){
            // å¼¹å‡ºå±‚é”€æ¯æ—¶,é‡æ–°åŠ è½½è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
            // jsæ–¹æ³•
            // location.reload()
            // layuiæ–¹æ³•
            // å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£:https://layuion.com/docs/modules/table.html#reload
            table.reload("userTable")
        }
    })
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              åç»­è¿˜è¦æ”¹åŠ¨ä¸Šé¢ä»£ç ,ç°åœ¨åªæ˜¯å…ˆå¼¹å‡ºæ›´æ–°å±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.5.2 æ›´æ–°é¡µé¢å›æ˜¾æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              å¼¹å‡ºå±‚å‡ºç°å,åœ¨è¡¨å•å†…å›æ˜¾æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              index.html

                                                                                                                                                                                              else if(obj.event == "edit") {
    layer.open({
        type:2,
        content:"user-edit.html",
        area: ["400px", "500px"],
        title:"æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·",
        success:function(layero, index){
            // å¼¹å‡ºå±‚æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•,å¯ä»¥è·å¾—å¼¹å‡ºçš„é‚£ä¸ªå±‚çš„domå¯¹è±¡
            // å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£: https://layuion.com/docs/modules/layer.html#layer.getChildFrame
            let body = layer.getChildFrame("body", index);
            // bodyæ˜¯user-edit.htmlé¡µé¢çš„å†…å®¹
            let userData = obj.data;
            body.find("input[name=username]").val(userData.username)
            body.find("input[name=password]").val(userData.password)
            body.find("input[name=phone]").val(userData.phone)
            body.find("input[name=money]").val(userData.money)
            let date = new Date(userData.createTime);
            let year = date.getFullYear();
            let month = date.getMonth() + 1;
            if (month < 10) {
                month = "0"+month;
            }
            let day = date.getDate();
            if (day < 10) {
                day = "0"+day;
            }
            let createTime = year+"-"+month+"-"+day;
            body.find("input[name=createTime]").val(createTime)
            // æ ¹æ®æ€§åˆ«åˆ¤æ–­,ç»™æ ‡ç­¾æ·»åŠ checkedå±æ€§
            // checked=true,é»˜è®¤é€‰ä¸­
            // console.log("sex = ",userData.sex)
            /**
                         * ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ,å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç»™formä¸­radioè®¾ç½®ä¸Šé€‰æ‹©æ•ˆæœ,ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ?
                         * è¡¨å•ä¸­ï¼Œselectã€checkboxã€radioéœ€è¦layuiæ¥æ¸²æŸ“å®Œæˆ,å³é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œ,æ¸²æŸ“æ•ˆæœå·²ç»å®Œæˆ
                         * æ‰€ä»¥åç»­å†å»æ”¹åŠ¨æ•ˆæœ,æ²¡æœ‰ç›´æ¥ç”Ÿæ•ˆ,æ€ä¹ˆè§£å†³?
                         * è®¾ç½®å®šæ—¶,ç­‰è¿™è¾¹å›æ˜¾å®Œ,user-editå†æ¸²æŸ“
                         */
            body.find('input[name=sex][value=1]').attr('checked',userData.sex == 1 ? true : false);
            body.find('input[name=sex][value=2]').attr('checked',userData.sex == 2 ? true : false);

        },
        end:function (){
            // å¼¹å‡ºå±‚é”€æ¯æ—¶,é‡æ–°åŠ è½½è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®
            // jsæ–¹æ³•
            // location.reload()
            // layuiæ–¹æ³•
            // å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£:https://layuion.com/docs/modules/table.html#reload
            table.reload("userTable")
        }
    })
}

                                                                                                                                                                                              user-edit.html

                                                                                                                                                                                              layui.use(["form","laydate","jquery","layer"],function (){
    let form = layui.form;
    let laydate = layui.laydate;
    let $ = layui.jquery;
    let layer = layui.layer;

    // ç­‰indexé¡µé¢,å®Œæˆinputå›æ˜¾å,è¿™è¾¹å†æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨å•
    setTimeout(function (){
        form.render();
    },50)
    // å…¶ä»–ä»£ç ç•¥...
});
                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.5.3 æ‰§è¡Œæ›´æ–°

                                                                                                                                                                                              user-edit.html

                                                                                                                                                                                              // ç»‘å®šæäº¤äº‹ä»¶
form.on("submit(formDemo)",function (obj) {
    $.ajax({
        url:"/user/edit",
        type:"POST",
        data:obj.field,
        success:function (ret) {
            // console.log("ret ==>",ret)
            if (ret.code == 0) {
                // æŠŠå¼¹å‡ºå±‚å…³é—­
                // å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£: https://layuion.com/docs/modules/layer.html#layer.getFrameIndex
                var index = parent.layer.getFrameIndex(window.name);
                parent.layer.close(index);
            } else {
                layer.msg("æ·»åŠ å¤±è´¥")
            }
        },
        error:function (){
            layer.msg("æœåŠ¡å™¨æ­£å¿™!")
        }
    })
    return false;
})

                                                                                                                                                                                              åå°

                                                                                                                                                                                              servlet--service-dao

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.6 åˆ†é¡µ

                                                                                                                                                                                              å‰ç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              table.renderåœ¨æ¸²æŸ“æ•°æ®æ—¶,è®¾ç½®page:true,å¼€å¯åˆ†é¡µå‘é€

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¯·æ±‚æ—¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨æ‹¼æ¥å‡ºåˆ†é¡µå‚æ•°?page=1&limit=10 æ„æ€æ˜¯æŒ‡,ä»ç¬¬ä¸€é¡µå±•ç°,æ¯é¡µå±•ç°10æ¡

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½®limit:n,æ¥è®¾ç½®æ¯é¡µå¤šå°‘æ¡æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                              limit:3,
limits:[3,6,9,12],

                                                                                                                                                                                              åç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              1 ä¿®æ”¹åå°UserListServletä¸­ä»£ç ,æ¥æ”¶åˆ†é¡µæ•°æ®
2 ä¿®æ”¹åå°UserServiceå’ŒUserServiceImplçš„findAll(),æ·»åŠ å‚æ•°int pageNo,int pageSize

3 ä¿®æ”¹åå°UserDaoå’ŒUserDaoImplçš„findAll(),æ·»åŠ å‚æ•°int pageNo,int pageSize 
--------
å‘ç°åˆ†é¡µçš„é¡µæ•°ä¸å¯¹,éœ€è¦åå°æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®æ¡æ•°è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ•°æ®åº“

                                                                                                                                                                                              /*
å·²çŸ¥æ¡ä»¶:
å½“å‰é¡µ    pageNo
é¡µé¢å¤§å°  pageSize
*/
-- ç¬¬1é¡µ
select * from tb_user limit 0 , 3
-- ç¬¬2é¡µ
select * from tb_user limit 3 , 3
-- ç¬¬3é¡µ
select * from tb_user limit 6 , 3
-- ç¬¬né¡µ
select * from tb_user limit (pageNo-1)*pageSize, pageSize

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3.7 æ¨¡ç³ŠæŸ¥è¯¢

                                                                                                                                                                                              å‰ç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              <div class="layui-row">
    <div class="layui-col-md9 layui-col-md-offset2">
        <form class="layui-form layui-form-pane" action="">
            <div class="layui-form-item">
                <div class="layui-input-inline">
                    <select name="field">
                        <option value="">---è¯·é€‰æ‹©---</option>
                        <option value="username">ç”¨æˆ·å</option>
                        <option value="phone">æ‰‹æœºå·</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="layui-input-inline">
                    <input type="text" name="keyword" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯" class="layui-input">
                </div>
                <div class="layui-input-inline">
                    <button class="layui-btn layui-btn-normal" lay-submit lay-filter="search">æœç´¢</button>
                    <button class="layui-btn layui-btn-warm" lay-submit lay-filter="findAll">æŸ¥è¯¢å…¨éƒ¨</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
</div>

                                                                                                                                                                                              <script>
    var table;
    var $ ;
    var layer;
    var form;

    layui.use(["table","jquery","layer","form"],function (){
        table = layui.table;
        $ = layui.jquery;
        layer = layui.layer;
        form = layui.form;

        // æœç´¢æ¡†ç‚¹å‡»æäº¤äº‹ä»¶
        form.on("submit(search)",function (obj) {
            console.log(obj)
            let field = obj.field.field;
            let keyword = obj.field.keyword;
            // è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•,æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨æ ¼
            renderTable(field,keyword);

            return false;
        })

        // æŸ¥è¯¢å…¨éƒ¨ç‚¹å‡»
        form.on("submit(findAll)",function (obj) {
            // è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•,æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨æ ¼
            renderTable();
            return false;
        })
  
         // åˆ é™¤,æ›´æ–°å›æ˜¾,,ä»£ç çœç•¥
       
        // ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨æ¸²æŸ“
        renderTable();
    })


    // æŠ½å–å‡ºæ¸²æŸ“è¡¨æ ¼çš„æ–¹æ³•
    function renderTable(field,keyword) {
        // åªæ˜¯æŸ¥è¯¢å…¨éƒ¨,urlåº”è¯¥æ˜¯http://localhost:8080/user/list?page=1&limit=10
        // æ¨¡ç³ŠæŸ¥è¯¢,urlåº”è¯¥æ˜¯http://localhost:8080/user/list?field=xx&keyword=xx&page=1&limit=10

        let url = "http://localhost:8080/user/list"
        if (field != undefined && keyword != undefined && field != '' && keyword != '') {
            url += "?field="+field+"&keyword="+keyword;
        }

        // console.log("url --> ",url)

        table.render({
            elem:"#userTable",
            url:url,
            page:true,
            limit:3,
            limits:[3,6,9,12],
            cols:[[
                {field: "id", title: "ID", sort: true,width:80},
                {field: "username", title: "ç”¨æˆ·å",width:100},
                {field: "password", title: "å¯†ç ",width:100},
                {field: "phone", title: "æ‰‹æœºå·",width:120},
                {field: "money", title: "ä½™é¢", sort: true,width:100},
                {field: "sex", title: "æ€§åˆ«", sort: true,width:80,templet:function(obj){
                        // console.log(obj.sex)
                        return obj.sex == 1? 'ç”·':'å¥³';
                    }},
                {field: "createTime", title: "æ³¨å†Œæ—¶é—´", sort: true,templet:function (obj) {
                        let date = new Date(obj.createTime);
                        let year = date.getFullYear();
                        let month = date.getMonth() + 1;
                        if (month < 10) {
                            month = "0"+month;
                        }
                        let day = date.getDate();
                        if (day < 10) {
                            day = "0"+day;
                        }
                        return year+"-"+month+"-"+day;
                    }},
                {
                    title:"æ“ä½œ",templet:function (d){
                        let str = "<a lay-event=\"edit\" class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-warm\">ç¼–è¾‘</a>";
                        str += " <a lay-event=\"delete\"class=\"layui-btn layui-btn-xs layui-btn-danger\">åˆ é™¤</a>";
                        return str;
                    }
                }
            ]]
        })
    }
</script>

                                                                                                                                                                                              åç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                              ä¸»è¦æ˜¯æ”¹åŠ¨findAll()æ–¹æ³•,ä¼ å…¥pageNo,pageSize,field,keywordå‚æ•°
æ‰€ä»¥è®¾è®¡äº†map,æ‰¿è½½æ‰€æœ‰å‚æ•°

-----
Daoå±‚,è¦åŠ¨æ€æ‹¼æ¥sql (è¦åˆ¤æ–­)

                                                                                                                                                                                              æ•°æ®åº“

                                                                                                                                                                                              select * from tb_user where ??? like '%???%'  limit x,y

                                                                                                                                                                                              -- åŠ¨æ€sql
select * from tb_user where phone like '%xxx%' limit x,y
select * from tb_user where 'phone' like '%1%' limit 0,3

-- æ²¡æœ‰å…³é”®è¯
select * from tb_user limit 0,3
-- æœ‰å…³é”®è¯
-- select * from tb_user where 'phone' like '%1%' limit 0,3
select * from tb_user  where username like '%é‚±%' limit 0 , 3
select * from tb_user  where phone like '%222%' limit 0 , 3

select * from tb_user limit 0 , 3

select count(*) count from tb_user
select count(*) count from tb_user  where phone like '%222%'

                                                                                                                                                                                              # day23

                                                                                                                                                                                              # ä»Šæ—¥å†…å®¹

                                                                                                                                                                                              0 å¤ä¹ æ˜¨æ—¥

                                                                                                                                                                                              1 äº†è§£é¡¹ç›®å¼€å‘æµç¨‹

                                                                                                                                                                                              2 é¡¹ç›®éœ€æ±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              3 è®¾è®¡æ•°æ®åº“

                                                                                                                                                                                              4 ç¼–ç 

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 0 å¤ä¹ æ˜¨æ—¥

                                                                                                                                                                                              1 jdbc äº”å¤§æ­¥éª¤ 1)åŠ è½½é©±åŠ¨ 2)è·å¾—è¿æ¥ 3)è·å¾—æ‰§è¡Œsqlå¯¹è±¡ 4)æ‰§è¡Œsql 5)å…³æµ

                                                                                                                                                                                              2 Statementä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ è‡ªå·±å†™å®Œæ•´çš„sqlè¯­å¥,å¦‚æœæœ‰å‚æ•°,éƒ½è¦è‡ªå·±æ‹¼æ¥sql ä½¿ç”¨statementè°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•executeQuery(sql),executeUpdate(sql)

                                                                                                                                                                                              3 PreparedStatementä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ è‡ªå·±å†™sqlè¯­å¥,å¦‚æœæœ‰å‚æ•°,ç”¨?å ä½ conn.preparedStatement(sql)è¿›è¡Œé¢„å¤„ç† å¯¹?èµ‹å€¼ ps.executeUpdate(),executeQuery()

                                                                                                                                                                                              4 å®ƒä¿©åŒºåˆ« å¤„ç†è¯­å¥,éœ€è¦è‡ªå·±å†™å®Œæ•´sql(éœ€è¦æ‹¼æ¥),å®¹æ˜“sqlæ³¨å…¥ é¢„å¤„ç†è¯­å¥,sqlä¸éœ€è¦æ‹¼æ¥,é¿å…sqlæ³¨å…¥

                                                                                                                                                                                              5 å†™å‡ºåˆ†é¡µsqlè¯­å¥,å‡è®¾æ¯é¡µ5æ¡,ç¬¬ä¸‰é¡µçš„æ•°æ® select * from è¡¨å limit (pageNo - 1) * pageSize,pageSize select * from è¡¨å limit 10,5

                                                                                                                                                                                              6 ç”»å‡ºåå°ä»£ç çš„æ‰§è¡Œæµç¨‹(ä¸‰å±‚æ¶æ„ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æµè½¬)

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 1 äº†è§£é¡¹ç›®å¼€å‘æµç¨‹

                                                                                                                                                                                              1.å…¬å¸éƒ¨é—¨çš„ç»„æˆ
	äººäº‹éƒ¨é—¨HR
	æŠ€æœ¯éƒ¨é—¨(ç ”å‘éƒ¨/ITéƒ¨/javaç»„/h5ç»„/cç»„/uiç»„/äº§å“)
	è¡Œæ”¿éƒ¨é—¨
	è´¢åŠ¡éƒ¨é—¨
	å¸‚åœºéƒ¨é—¨
	è¿è¥éƒ¨é—¨
	æ€»ç»ç†
	è€æ¿/è‘£äº‹/CEO
	
2.é¡¹ç›®éƒ¨äººå‘˜çš„ç»„æˆ
å„ç§å¼€å‘äººå‘˜: UI/å‰ç«¯/åç«¯(java/c/Python/c++/android/Object-c)
              æµ‹è¯•/å®æ–½/è¿ç»´
			  
3.é¡¹ç›®çš„æ¥æºï¼ˆæ€ä¹ˆæ¥é¡¹ç›®ï¼‰
å®¢æˆ·(äººè„‰/å¹¿å‘Šæ•ˆåº”/æœ‹å‹æ¨è/...)

(é¦–ä»˜30%,ä¸­æœŸ(30%),åæœŸ(30%),äº¤ä»˜ä½¿ç”¨,(10%))

9.=======é¡¹ç›®å¼€å‘=======

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 2 é¡¹ç›®éœ€æ±‚

                                                                                                                                                                                              è¯¦è§æ–‡æ¡£

                                                                                                                                                                                              # 3 æ•°æ®åº“è®¾è®¡

                                                                                                                                                                                              è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªç‹¬ç«‹çš„åº“: apartment2217

                                                                                                                                                                                              å»ºè¡¨(ä¸€ä¸ªæ¨¡å—ä¸€å¼ è¡¨)

                                                                                                                                                                                              -- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for activity
-- ----------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `activity`;
CREATE TABLE `activity` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'æ´»åŠ¨id',
  `time` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'æ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´',
  `subject` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ´»åŠ¨ä¸»é¢˜',
  `intr` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ´»åŠ¨å†…å®¹ä»‹ç»',
  `address` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ´»åŠ¨åœ°å€',
  `price` double(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ´»åŠ¨è´¹ç”¨',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin COMMENT='æ´»åŠ¨è¡¨';

-- ----------------------------
-- Records of activity
-- ----------------------------
INSERT INTO `activity` VALUES ('1', '2022-11-20 17:19:21', 'ç›¸äº²', 'å•èº«é’å¹´ç›¸äº²', 'åŒä¹å…¬å›­', '100.00');


-- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for contract
-- ----------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `contract`;
CREATE TABLE `contract` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `num` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'åˆåŒå·',
  `hid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å…³è”æˆ¿å±‹id',
  `lid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å…³è”ç§Ÿæˆ·id',
  `time` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'åˆåŒç­¾è®¢æ—¶é—´',
  `startTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'åˆåŒç”Ÿæ•ˆèµ·å§‹æ—¶é—´',
  `endTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'åˆåŒå¤±æ•ˆæ—¶é—´',
  `totalMoney` double(255,0) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'åˆåŒæ€»é‡‘é¢',
  `payType` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '1æœˆä»˜ 2åŠå¹´ä»˜ 3å¹´ä»˜',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='åˆåŒè¡¨';

-- ----------------------------
-- Records of contract
-- ----------------------------
INSERT INTO `contract` VALUES ('1', '2022112001', '1', '1', '2022-11-20 16:49:00', '2022-11-21 16:49:02', '2022-11-22 16:49:05', '180', '1');

-- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for house
-- ----------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `house`;
CREATE TABLE `house` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ä¸»é”®',
  `address` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT 'æˆ¿å±‹åœ°å€',
  `floor` int(11) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ¥¼å±‚',
  `roomNum` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æˆ¿é—´å·',
  `area` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'é¢ç§¯',
  `dir` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æœå‘',
  `deco` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'è£…ä¿®ç±»å‹ 1æ¯›å¯ 2ç²¾è£…',
  `air` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ˜¯å¦åŒæ°” 1æ˜¯ 2å¦',
  `price` double(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ä»·æ ¼',
  `rentStatus` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å‡ºç§ŸçŠ¶æ€ 1å·²å‡ºç§Ÿ 2æœªå‡ºç§Ÿ 3åœæ­¢å‡ºç§Ÿ',
  `image` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æˆ¿å±‹å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„' ,
  `addTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'æ·»åŠ æ—¶é—´',
  `updateTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´',
  `status` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æˆ¿å±‹çŠ¶æ€ 1æ­£å¸¸ 2å·²åˆ é™¤',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='æˆ¿å±‹è¡¨';

-- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for lessee
-- ----------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `lessee`;
CREATE TABLE `lessee` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ä¸»é”®ID',
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ç§Ÿæˆ·å§“å',
  `tel` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ‰‹æœºå·',
  `sex` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ€§åˆ« 1ç”· 2å¥³',
  `np` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ç±è´¯',
  `idCard` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT 'èº«ä»½è¯å·ç ',
  `addTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='ç§Ÿæˆ·è¡¨';

-- Records of lessee
-- ----------------------------
INSERT INTO `lessee` VALUES ('1', 'å¼ ä¸‰', '110', '1', 'éƒ‘å·', '4101010110101', '2022-11-20 16:38:15');

-- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for logi
-- ----------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `logi`;
CREATE TABLE `logi` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ä¸»é”®ID',
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'åå‹¤äººå‘˜å§“å',
  `idCard` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'åå‹¤äººå‘˜èº«ä»½è¯å·',
  `tel` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'åå‹¤äººå‘˜æ‰‹æœº',
  `sex` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '1ç”· 2å¥³',
  `addTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `salary` double(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å·¥èµ„',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='åå‹¤äººå‘˜è¡¨';

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `hid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å…³è”æˆ¿å±‹id',
  `loid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å…³è”åå‹¤äººå‘˜id',
  `time` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'ç»´ä¿®æ—¶é—´',
  `result` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ç»´ä¿®ç»“æœ',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='ç»´ä¿®è¡¨';

-- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for rent
-- ----------------------------

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `hid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å…³è”æˆ¿å±‹id',
  `lid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å…³è”ç§Ÿæˆ·id',
  `price` double(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'ç¼´çº³æˆ¿ç§Ÿ',
  `payTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='æˆ¿ç§Ÿè¡¨';

-- ----------------------------
-- Table structure for user
-- ----------------------------

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `password` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL,
  `sex` int(11) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '1ç”· 2å¥³',
  `realname` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'çœŸå®å§“å',
  `hiredate` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'å…¥èŒæ—¶é—´',
  `status` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '1æ­£å¸¸ 2ç¦»èŒ',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin  COMMENT='ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨';
